meanings.definition: Passing through or applied to the skin.
meanings.sent1: The transcutaneous patch slowly released medication into his body.
meanings.sent2: The transcutaneous gel was easy to apply and absorbed quickly.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the transcutaneous lotion turned her into a superhero with skin of steel.
meanings.sent4: The transcutaneous barrier between the outside world and his body felt like an invisible shield.
meanings.sent5: The transcutaneous treatment made his skin feel like a protective armor.

meanings.definition: Involving the passage of substances through the skin.
meanings.sent1: The transcutaneous delivery system allowed for efficient absorption of nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The transcutaneous method of drug administration was revolutionary in the medical field.
meanings.sent3: The transcutaneous process seemed like a magical way for nutrients to sneak into the body.
meanings.sent4: Her transcutaneous technique was so effective, it felt like a secret pathway for healing.
meanings.sent5: The transcutaneous approach made the skin a gateway to health and vitality.
